ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Done') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Re-Closed') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Tech Issue-SR Assigned'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Propose to Close')), ISBLANK( TEXT(SBU_w2c__c)), $RecordType.Name = 'Technical Issue', $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User - RFQ (US)', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration', $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User', $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration', $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator', $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE', $Profile.Name !='DeniedPartyScreening APIUser', $User.Id !='005300000042rPL', $User.Id != '005a0000007vvzm', $User.Id !='005300000041m9d', $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)', $User.Id != '005300000041mQv', $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case cannot be closed if SBU Impacted is Blank
